Last year, after announcing I’d explore running for president myself, Megyn Kelly asked why I wanted to be president? I replied, “I hold the sort of conservative values which America needs today. And in the same way Reagan kept his word by bringing home the hostages, I promise to secure the border and solve the immigration problem. I went on to say I'd protect the American people, their lives, their jobs, their health, and their children in the same manner I protect my own. I told her audience I was in love with America.
